com.sun.grizzly.http.servlet
Class HttpServletResponseImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.grizzly.http.servlet.HttpServletResponseImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServletResponse, ServletResponse
public class HttpServletResponseImpl
extends Object
implements HttpServletResponse

Facade class that wraps a GrizzlyResponse object. All methods are delegated to the wrapped response.

Version:
$Revision: 1.9 $ $Date: 2007/05/05 05:32:43 $
Author:
Remy Maucherat, Jean-Francois Arcand
